metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for the ZKP2P P2P trading ecosystem — protocol analytics, market intelligence, and trading guides

plugins.name: peerlytics
plugins.description: ZKP2P protocol analytics, market intelligence, and explorer data via the Peerlytics Paid API. Requires API key.

plugins.name: usdctofiat
plugins.description: USDC on/off-ramp guides, rate strategy advisors, and earnings calculators. Free — no API key required.
